QuestData.Title: Take the Power
QuestData.Description: Wait! Before you enter, I would ask something of you.$b$bWhile we have not had a wildseed in some time, we did keep stores of anima. It served us well in staving off the gorm.$b$bWhatever has happened to my village, I do not want this power to remain in their hands. It will better serve Ardenweald in other groves.$b$bKeep an eye out for any anima within the village. We will put it to better use elsewhere.
